alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Superior; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 31 at 1:13AM MST until January 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures around 30 possible. * WHERE...Superior, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon and West Pinal County. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Superior; West Pinal County
